name: Dot (itch) (gattoblu123)
description:
What makes a board game a board game? THE GAME BOARD

Dot is a 8x8 board game, made of dots, obviously. Move the red dot through the dots

'Green' as 'Start'

'Red' as 'End'

YOU

The main character is... a Dot. Better to say, it is a red dot. Why red? Random.

You can navigate through the game board with Red Dot using your keyboard (WASD or arrows) or with your Joystick (D-Pad or Left Stick).

DOTS

There are many elements, dots, with specific characteristics

- Common dot

You can walk on it, it doesn't do anything special;

- Spiral Dot 

It is a teleporter: if touched it randomly teleports you in a dot of the game board. Pay attention to dangerous dot...

- Rainbow Dot 

It is the good one: it's a point-dot and it gives you points without any negative consequences;

- ReDo Dot 

Do you want changes? Touch it! It's a particular dot, it makes your game board brand new;

- Bomb Dot 

It's a totally negative dot. It directly brings you to the game over;

- Electric Dot 

It's a negative dot. It doesn't makes you lose, but it subtract points... A lot of points...

 

THE PURPOSE

 The purpose is to reach the end how many times you can, but you will need to find the amount of points required.

Don't worry, some dots can give you points, so go on them through the game board. 

MODALITIES

There are tree modalities:

- the easy one

- the not easy (medium) one

- the hard one.

 What changes is the amount of special dots. But it's random, so hope to be lucky!

Go now through the game board, collect points and avoid dangerous dots!

[Dot is available freely for windows 64-bit PCs.]
